name: [Lunar] Noviluna
desc: This high-capacity portable W-Engine can collect dissipated energy from its surroundings, thus enhancing the combat effectiveness of its operator. It is a perfect choice for novice explorers who are worried that their W-Engine may run out of power during expeditions.
desc2: Equip to increase Attack Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: A high-capacity portable W-Engine that can collect dissipated energy from its surroundings, thus enhancing the combat effectiveness of its operator.
phaseDescs: Launching an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> generates <ct color=#2BAD00>3</ct> Energy for the equipper. This effect can trigger once every 12s.
Launching an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> generates <ct color=#2BAD00>3.5</ct> Energy for the equipper. This effect can trigger once every 12s.
Launching an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> generates <ct color=#2BAD00>4</ct> Energy for the equipper. This effect can trigger once every 12s.
Launching an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> generates <ct color=#2BAD00>4.5</ct> Energy for the equipper. This effect can trigger once every 12s.
Launching an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> generates <ct color=#2BAD00>5</ct> Energy for the equipper. This effect can trigger once every 12s.
